case.name: SZMMF v Minister for Immigration and Citizenship [2008] FCA 1882 (12 December 2008)

citphrases.citphrase: ten year delay in seeking judicial review
szfde v minister for immigration and citizenship immigration
the refugee review tribunal ("the tribunal") affirmed a decision refusing the appellants' application for protection visas
the appellants did not attend the tribunal hearing as a result of fraudulent advice given by a purported registered migration agent
whether there was fraud "by" or "on" the tribunal. immigration
distinction between tribunal process and inter partes litigation
whether fraud practised by an agent upon the applicants for a protection visa subverted the operation of div 4 of pt 7 of the migration act 1958 (cth)
whether this fraud led to the jurisdiction of the tribunal remaining constructively unexercised. administrative law
availability of constitutional writs in cases of fraud.
